item.title: Single Work T-shirt
item.dc:creator: Alpha
item.description: Introducing our classic black jacket, perfect for any occasion. Made with high-quality materials, this jacket is both durable and stylish....
item.content:encoded:
Introducing our classic black jacket, perfect for any occasion. Made with high-quality materials, this jacket is both durable and stylish. The black color makes it easy to pair with any outfit, and the sleek design adds a touch of sophistication.

This jacket features a zip-up front and two side pockets, providing both comfort and functionality. The material is a soft blend of cotton and polyester, making it comfortable to wear all day long. The slim-fit design ensures a modern look, while the ribbed cuffs and hemline provide a snug fit.

Whether you’re going out for a night on the town or running errands on a chilly day, this black jacket will keep you warm and stylish. Order now and add this versatile piece to your wardrobe.
